mfgName.name: mfgName
mfgName.description: Manufacturing name of the device. Up to 30 characters

mfgDate.name: mfgDate
mfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the chassis

mfgModelType.name: mfgModelType
mfgModelType.description: Model type of the chassis. Up to 10 characters

mfgDefaultID.name: mfgDefaultID
mfgDefaultID.description: Default one-time user ID. This ID should be used for the first time access to the system. This ID will not be accepted once a real user ID is added.

mfgDfltPasswd.name: mfgDfltPasswd
mfgDfltPasswd.description: Default one-time password to go with the default user ID. The password may contain non-printable characters up to 10 ASCII characters. Passwords are hashed and are for comparison only

mfgNumShelves.name: mfgNumShelves
mfgNumShelves.description: Number of shelves in the chassis. This number reflects the number of rows of the table below. This number is automatically adjusted everytime a row is added to the table below.

mfgShelfTable.name: mfgShelfTable
mfgShelfTable.description: This table represents the number of shelves and the number of slots per shelf in the chassis.

mfgShelfEntry.name: mfgShelfEntry
mfgShelfEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

mfgShelfID.name: mfgShelfID
mfgShelfID.description: Integer ID of each shelf in the chassis. The shelf number is always one for both GM1608 and GM3217. In the case of of GM3234, the bottom shelf is 1 while the top shelf is 2. As for GMX128, the order of numbering is from the top shelf to the bottom shelf. In other words, the top shelf is assigned 1.

mfgNumSlots.name: mfgNumSlots
mfgNumSlots.description: total number of slots in a given shelf.

mfgCRCChecksum.name: mfgCRCChecksum
mfgCRCChecksum.description: 32 bit CRC of the manufacturing section. This CRC is automatically calculated everytime information is updated from the manufacturing section. The manufacturing section is static once the chassis leaves the LuxN manufacturing premise.

cpIpAddress.name: cpIpAddress
cpIpAddress.description: IP Address of the Active Communication Processor

cpNetMask.name: cpNetMask
cpNetMask.description: Net mask for the Active Communication Processor

cpMIBVersion.name: cpMIBVersion
cpMIBVersion.description: Version of the LuxN MIB implemented by this device. This value may be reset everytime a new CP code is downloaded.

cpBootPromVer.name: cpBootPromVer
cpBootPromVer.description: The current version string of the Boot PROM code

cpROMSize.name: cpROMSize
cpROMSize.description: Total Size of the ROM in Kilobyes

cpNumSubDiv.name: cpNumSubDiv
cpNumSubDiv.description: Number of the subdivisions of the ROM.

cpSubDivTable.name: cpSubDivTable
cpSubDivTable.description: This table represents the number of sub divisions and the size of each subdivision in ROM memory

cpSubDivEntry.name: cpSubDivEntry
cpSubDivEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

cpSubDivIndex.name: cpSubDivIndex
cpSubDivIndex.description: Integer ID of each sub division in the ROM. The order of numbering is from the top of the ROM to the bottom of the ROM.

cpSubDivDescr.name: cpSubDivDescr
cpSubDivDescr.description: Display Name of each Sub Division in ROM

cpSubDivSize.name: cpSubDivSize
cpSubDivSize.description: Size of each sub division in ROM in bytes

cpSubDivOffset.name: cpSubDivOffset
cpSubDivOffset.description: Starting address of each sub division in the ROM in HEX notation.

cpSubDivImgVersion.name: cpSubDivImgVersion
cpSubDivImgVersion.description: Display Version of each Images in ROM.

cpSubDivImgDBVersion.name: cpSubDivImgDBVersion
cpSubDivImgDBVersion.description: Display Database Version of each Images in ROM.

cpTable.name: cpTable
cpTable.description: This table represents the information for each active or standby communication processor

cpEntry.name: cpEntry
cpEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

cpCardShelf.name: cpCardShelf
cpCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in.

cpCardSlot.name: cpCardSlot
cpCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card is in.

cpMode.name: cpMode
cpMode.description: Type of the communication processor. The valid types are Active or Standby.

cpDsgntdMode.name: cpDsgntdMode
cpDsgntdMode.description: Designation Type of the communication processor. The valid types are Active or Standby.

cpState.name: cpState
cpState.description: The state of the CP card.

cpMacAddr.name: cpMacAddr
cpMacAddr.description: MAC address of the Communication processor in HEX

cpName.name: cpName
cpName.description: Display (Network) name of the Communication processor

cpMfgDate.name: cpMfgDate
cpMfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the CP card

cpFWVersionID.name: cpFWVersionID
cpFWVersionID.description: The current version string of the CP FW code

cpSetState.name: cpSetState
cpSetState.description: Instruct the CP to do a warmboot. A get on this will always return an other.

cpHWName.name: cpHWName
cpHWName.description: Display Hardware name of the CP Card.

cpCleiNum.name: cpCleiNum
cpCleiNum.description: CLEI number of the mux/dmux Card.

cpModelNum.name: cpModelNum
cpModelNum.description: Model number of the CP card. Up to 15 characters

cpSetMode.name: cpSetMode
cpSetMode.description: Toggle the Active/Standby mode of the active CP.

cpSNMPTrapHost1.name: cpSNMPTrapHost1
cpSNMPTrapHost1.description: IP Address of the first SNMP Trap host. A NULL IP address means no TRAP should be sent to this address. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpSNMPTrapHost2.name: cpSNMPTrapHost2
cpSNMPTrapHost2.description: IP Address of the second SNMP Trap host. A NULL IP address means no TRAP should be sent to this address. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpSNMPTrapHost3.name: cpSNMPTrapHost3
cpSNMPTrapHost3.description: IP Address of the third SNMP Trap host. A NULL IP address means no TRAP should be sent to this address. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpSNMPSendTrap.name: cpSNMPSendTrap
cpSNMPSendTrap.description: If set to true, traps will be sent out. If set to false, traps will not be sent out. This variable is reset to true (enable) on each boot cycle.

cpGateway.name: cpGateway
cpGateway.description: Gateway IP Address of the Active Communication Processor. A NULL IP address means Gateway hasn't been configured.

cpMaxSessions.name: cpMaxSessions
cpMaxSessions.description: Maximum allowed Telnet Sessions on the Active Communication Processor. Valid values are 1 to 6.

cpSessionTimeout.name: cpSessionTimeout
cpSessionTimeout.description: Maximum timeout (in seconds) that can be set for a Telnet session on the Active Communication Processor. Valid values are greater than 30 secs.

cpDate.name: cpDate
cpDate.description: Current Date on the Active Communication Processor. The format is in the form of mm-dd-yy in which mm is the two digit month, dd is the two digit day of the month, and yy is the two digit year.

cpTime.name: cpTime
cpTime.description: Current Time on the Active Communication Processor. The format is in the form of hh:mm:ss in which hh is the hour, mm is the minute and ss is the second. The valid values for hour goes from 0 to 23. In order to work with LuxN NMS, it needs to be set to GMT time

cpGetCommunity.name: cpGetCommunity
cpGetCommunity.description: User configurable SNMP Get Community String.

cpSetCommunity.name: cpSetCommunity
cpSetCommunity.description: User Configurable SNMP Set Community String.

cpSNMPTrapCommunity1.name: cpSNMPTrapCommunity1
cpSNMPTrapCommunity1.description: User configurable trap community string for first trap host. Will return an error if the corresponding trap host is invalid or not set.

cpSNMPTrapCommunity2.name: cpSNMPTrapCommunity2
cpSNMPTrapCommunity2.description: User configurable trap community string for second trap host. Will return an error if the corresponding trap host is invalid or not set.

cpSNMPTrapCommunity3.name: cpSNMPTrapCommunity3
cpSNMPTrapCommunity3.description: User configurable trap community string for third trap host. Will return an error if the corresponding trap host is invalid or not set.

cpIMNIpAddress.name: cpIMNIpAddress
cpIMNIpAddress.description: IMN Ip address. Use for IP/IWM

cpAutoModuleUpdate.name: cpAutoModuleUpdate
cpAutoModuleUpdate.description: Flag to automatically enable/disable module update.

cpSNMPTrapHost4.name: cpSNMPTrapHost4
cpSNMPTrapHost4.description: IP Address of the fourth SNMP Trap host. A NULL IP address means no TRAP should be sent to this address. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpSNMPTrapHost5.name: cpSNMPTrapHost5
cpSNMPTrapHost5.description: IP Address of the fifth SNMP Trap host. A NULL IP address means no TRAP should be sent to this address. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpSNMPTrapCommunity4.name: cpSNMPTrapCommunity4
cpSNMPTrapCommunity4.description: User configurable trap community string for fourth trap host. Will return an error if the corresponding trap host is invalid or not set.

cpSNMPTrapCommunity5.name: cpSNMPTrapCommunity5
cpSNMPTrapCommunity5.description: User configurable trap community string for fifth trap host. Will return an error if the corresponding trap host is invalid or not set.

cpSNMPTrapHostPort1.name: cpSNMPTrapHostPort1
cpSNMPTrapHostPort1.description: User configurable trap port for the first trap host. Default value is 162

cpSNMPTrapHostPort2.name: cpSNMPTrapHostPort2
cpSNMPTrapHostPort2.description: User configurable trap port for the second trap host. Default value is 162

cpSNMPTrapHostPort3.name: cpSNMPTrapHostPort3
cpSNMPTrapHostPort3.description: User configurable trap port for the third trap host. Default value is 162

cpSNMPTrapHostPort4.name: cpSNMPTrapHostPort4
cpSNMPTrapHostPort4.description: User configurable trap port for the fourth trap host. Default value is 162

cpSNMPTrapHostPort5.name: cpSNMPTrapHostPort5
cpSNMPTrapHostPort5.description: User configurable trap port for the fifth trap host. Default value is 162

cpRedunSubDivTable.name: cpRedunSubDivTable
cpRedunSubDivTable.description: This table represents the number of sub divisions and the size of each subdivision in ROM memory of redundant (standby) MPM

cpRedunSubDivEntry.name: cpRedunSubDivEntry
cpRedunSubDivEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

cpRedunSubDivIndex.name: cpRedunSubDivIndex
cpRedunSubDivIndex.description: Integer ID of each sub division in the ROM. The order of numbering is from the top of the ROM to the bottom of the ROM.

cpRedunSubDivDescr.name: cpRedunSubDivDescr
cpRedunSubDivDescr.description: Display Name of each Sub Division in ROM

cpRedunSubDivImgVersion.name: cpRedunSubDivImgVersion
cpRedunSubDivImgVersion.description: Display Version of each Images in ROM.

cpRedunSubDivImgDBVersion.name: cpRedunSubDivImgDBVersion
cpRedunSubDivImgDBVersion.description: Display Database Version of each Images in ROM.

cpTimezone.name: cpTimezone
cpTimezone.description: Specifies the internation time zone used by the MPM to determine system time. The time zone is only used to system time calculations when NTP is enabled

cpNtpState.name: cpNtpState
cpNtpState.description: Specifies whether NTP support is enabled or disabled.

cpNtpTimeserver.name: cpNtpTimeserver
cpNtpTimeserver.description: Specifies the NTP time server queries for updates.

cpNtpUpdateInterval.name: cpNtpUpdateInterval
cpNtpUpdateInterval.description: Specifies the NTP time update interval in minutes.

cpTelnetClient.name: cpTelnetClient
cpTelnetClient.description: Enable/disable telnet client for active telnet sessions.

cpLogMask.name: cpLogMask
cpLogMask.description: Set the log mask. The masks are equivalent to syslog priorities.

cpLogServer1.name: cpLogServer1
cpLogServer1.description: IP Address of the first log server. A NULL IP address will remove this entry. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpLogServer2.name: cpLogServer2
cpLogServer2.description: IP Address of the first log server. A NULL IP address will remove this entry. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpLogServer3.name: cpLogServer3
cpLogServer3.description: IP Address of the first log server. A NULL IP address will remove this entry. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpLogServer4.name: cpLogServer4
cpLogServer4.description: IP Address of the first log server. A NULL IP address will remove this entry. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

cpLogServer5.name: cpLogServer5
cpLogServer5.description: IP Address of the first log server. A NULL IP address will remove this entry. Duplicate IP addresses will be rejected.

ccBootPromVer.name: ccBootPromVer
ccBootPromVer.description: The current version string of the CC Boot PROM code

ccROMSize.name: ccROMSize
ccROMSize.description: Total Size of the CC ROM in Kilobyes

ccNumSubDiv.name: ccNumSubDiv
ccNumSubDiv.description: Number of the subdivisions of the ROM.

ccSubDivTable.name: ccSubDivTable
ccSubDivTable.description: This table represents the number of sub divisions and the size of each subdivision in ROM memory

ccSubDivEntry.name: ccSubDivEntry
ccSubDivEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

ccSubDivIndex.name: ccSubDivIndex
ccSubDivIndex.description: Integer ID of each sub division in the ROM. The order of numbering is from the top of the ROM to the bottom of the ROM.

ccSubDivDescr.name: ccSubDivDescr
ccSubDivDescr.description: Display Name of each Sub Division in ROM

ccSubDivSize.name: ccSubDivSize
ccSubDivSize.description: Size of each sub division in ROM in kilobytes

ccSubDivOffset.name: ccSubDivOffset
ccSubDivOffset.description: Starting address of each sub division in the ROM in HEX notation.

ccNumber.name: ccNumber
ccNumber.description: Number of CC rows in the following table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

ccTable.name: ccTable
ccTable.description: This table represents the information for each channel card

ccEntry.name: ccEntry
ccEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

ccCardLocation.name: ccCardLocation
ccCardLocation.description: Location of the card. Valid values are: Local in the same chassis, or remote to this chassis

ccCardShelf.name: ccCardShelf
ccCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in. Valid values are: 1 to 2

ccCardSlot.name: ccCardSlot
ccCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the module is in. The range of valid values range from 1 through 17 depending on the chassis type and the shelf the module is in. To delete this card, set this variable to 0.

ccMfgDate.name: ccMfgDate
ccMfgDate.description: Date and Time of calibration of the CC card

ccModelType.name: ccModelType
ccModelType.description: Model type of the channel card.

ccName.name: ccName
ccName.description: User configurable name of the channel card

ccFWVersionID.name: ccFWVersionID
ccFWVersionID.description: The current version string of the CC FW code

ccMfgBiasCurrent.name: ccMfgBiasCurrent
ccMfgBiasCurrent.description: Bias current for the optical laser. This is the preset manufacturing value

ccMfgModulation.name: ccMfgModulation
ccMfgModulation.description: The frequency modulation for the optical laser. This value is the preset manufacturing value.

ccMfgApc.name: ccMfgApc
ccMfgApc.description: The APC value. This value is the preset manufacturing value

ccMfgIwmModulation.name: ccMfgIwmModulation
ccMfgIwmModulation.description: The frequency modulation for the IWM channel. This value is the preset manufacturing value

ccMfgRefClock.name: ccMfgRefClock
ccMfgRefClock.description: The value of the reference clock in decimal notation. For a given value, like 1660-EN, the actual value is 16.60-EN. In otherwords, assume a two digit decimal point, plus any appropriate scaling factor. This value is the preset manufacturing value.

ccMfgClockDiv.name: ccMfgClockDiv
ccMfgClockDiv.description: The clock divisor. Values are 1250, 622 or 155 in the appropriate clock frequency scale.

ccBandwidth.name: ccBandwidth
ccBandwidth.description: The bandwidth of the channel card.

ccSetState.name: ccSetState
ccSetState.description: Instruct the CC to do a warmboot or loopback. A get on this will always return an other.

ccModelNum.name: ccModelNum
ccModelNum.description: Model number of the CC card. Up to 15 characters

ccLinkITUNum.name: ccLinkITUNum
ccLinkITUNum.description: Link ITU number of the CC card. Up to 15 characters

ccLinkWavelength.name: ccLinkWavelength
ccLinkWavelength.description: Link Wavelength of the CC card

ccLaserType.name: ccLaserType
ccLaserType.description: Laser Type of the Channel Card.

ccRecvDiode.name: ccRecvDiode
ccRecvDiode.description: Receive Diode of the Channel Card.

ccLinkAutoDisable.name: ccLinkAutoDisable
ccLinkAutoDisable.description: Flag to enable/disable the CPE link when the threshold value crosses the lower hysteresis limit. The default value is disable. CPE disable with CPE Rx pass through is identical to normal CPE disable with the added feature that the remote CPE Tx will be disabled if a loss of light condition is detected on the local CPE Rx.

ccLinkName.name: ccLinkName
ccLinkName.description: Link name for fiber between the local and the remote cc card.

ccCsimModule.name: ccCsimModule
ccCsimModule.description: Whether colorSIM module is physically present, not installed or preconfigured.

ccHWName.name: ccHWName
ccHWName.description: Display Hardware name of the CC Card.

ccBackpackModule.name: ccBackpackModule
ccBackpackModule.description: Presence of Backpack module, installed or not Installed.

ccSwitchByShelfSlot.name: ccSwitchByShelfSlot
ccSwitchByShelfSlot.description: Initiate manual UPSR switching by shelf and slot.

ccPathID.name: ccPathID
ccPathID.description: Upsr Path ID name that this card is associated with. Set input equal NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if there is no card left associate with that path.

ccCpeDisableThreshold.name: ccCpeDisableThreshold
ccCpeDisableThreshold.description: CPE Disable Threshold (Link Rx Power) in dBm. The limit is from -32 to -8, but input should be an absolute value if using mib browser. A value of 0 in this field indicates that UPSR is not supported. This value will not take affect until ccLinkAutoDisable has been enabled.

ccCpeReEnableThreshold.name: ccCpeReEnableThreshold
ccCpeReEnableThreshold.description: CPE Re-enable threshold (Link Rx Power) in dBm. The limit is from -31 to -7, but input should be an absolute value if using mib browser. A value of 0 in this field indicates that UPSR is not supported. This value will not take affect until ccLinkAutoDisable has been enabled.

connTxNonMuxDmuxCardType.name: connTxNonMuxDmuxCardType
connTxNonMuxDmuxCardType.description: Type of module connected to Tx port of OCM.

connTxNonMuxDmuxPort.name: connTxNonMuxDmuxPort
connTxNonMuxDmuxPort.description: Conn port for CC's Tx port.Possible values based on card types that can connect to OCM are: FADM: 1=Conn A Tx, 2=Conn A Rx, 3=Local Tx 4=Local Rx, 5=Conn B Tx, 6=Conn B Rx OCMU/OCMITU/MCMT1/MCME1/OCM10G/OCM10G: 1=Link Tx, 2=Link Rx OFCM/OFCD: 1/2/3/4=port index, 5=EXP, 6=OUT/IN OSAM: 1=IN, 2=OUT W2CM/W2CMD:1=13M, 2=15M, 3=13D, 4=15D, 5=IN , 6=OUT W4CM/W4CD: 1=1470/1510, 2=1490/1530, 3=15501590/, 4=1570/1610, 5=EXP, 6=IN/OUT UPSM/OPPM: 1=Link A Tx, 2=Link A Rx, 3=Link B Tx, 4=Link B Rx, 5=Local Tx, 6=Local Rx.

connTxNonMuxDmuxShelf.name: connTxNonMuxDmuxShelf
connTxNonMuxDmuxShelf.description: The shelf the card conn to Tx port of OCM. Valid values are: 1 to 10.

connTxNonMuxDmuxSlot.name: connTxNonMuxDmuxSlot
connTxNonMuxDmuxSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card conn to Tx port of OCM.

connRxNonMuxDmuxCardType.name: connRxNonMuxDmuxCardType
connRxNonMuxDmuxCardType.description: Type of module connected to Rx port of OCM.

connRxNonMuxDmuxPort.name: connRxNonMuxDmuxPort
connRxNonMuxDmuxPort.description: Conn port for CC's Rx port.Possible values based on card types that can connect to OCM are: FADM: 1=Conn A Tx, 2=Conn A Rx, 3=Local Tx 4=Local Rx, 5=Conn B Tx, 6=Conn B Rx OCMU/OCMITU/MCMT1/MCME1/OCM10G/OCM10G: 1=Link Tx, 2=Link Rx OFCM/OFCD: 1/2/3/4=port index, 5=EXP, 6=OUT/IN OSAM: 1=IN, 2=OUT W2CM/W2CMD:1=13M, 2=15M, 3=13D, 4=15D, 5=IN , 6=OUT W4CM/W4CD: 1=1470/1510, 2=1490/1530, 3=15501590/, 4=1570/1610, 5=EXP, 6=IN/OUT UPSM/OPPM: 1=Link A Tx, 2=Link A Rx, 3=Link B Tx, 4=Link B Rx, 5=Local Tx, 6=Local Rx.

connRxNonMuxDmuxShelf.name: connRxNonMuxDmuxShelf
connRxNonMuxDmuxShelf.description: The shelf the card conn to Rx port of OCM. Valid values are: 1 to 10.

connRxNonMuxDmuxSlot.name: connRxNonMuxDmuxSlot
connRxNonMuxDmuxSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card conn to Rx port of OCM.

ccUpsrMode.name: ccUpsrMode
ccUpsrMode.description: UPSR mode for CC card: primary or backup. If not in upsr configuration, value is na. This value will not take affect until ccLinkAutoDisable has been enabled.

ccPairShelf.name: ccPairShelf
ccPairShelf.description: The shelf of other CC card in pair.

ccPairSlot.name: ccPairSlot
ccPairSlot.description: The slot of other CC card in pair. Input 0 to unpair OCMs and delete RSM connections if any.

ccAdminState.name: ccAdminState
ccAdminState.description: Administrative control over that cc card. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events gets generated. For remote CC, the default value is disabled

ccRegenPairShelf.name: ccRegenPairShelf
ccRegenPairShelf.description: The shelf of other CC card in OCM regeneration pair. This value will not take affect until ccLinkAutoDisable has been enabled.

ccRegenPairSlot.name: ccRegenPairSlot
ccRegenPairSlot.description: The slot of other CC card in OCM regeneration pair. Input 0 to unpair OCMs involved. This value will not take affect until ccLinkAutoDisable has been enabled.

ccCleiNum.name: ccCleiNum
ccCleiNum.description: CLEI number of the CC Card.

connCpeTxMcmescPort.name: connCpeTxMcmescPort
connCpeTxMcmescPort.description: The connected MCMESC port. 1=Link Tx, 2=Link Rx.

connCpeRxMcmescPort.name: connCpeRxMcmescPort
connCpeRxMcmescPort.description: The connected MCMESC port. 1=Link Tx, 2=Link Rx.

ccNumPorts.name: ccNumPorts
ccNumPorts.description: Total port numbers on each CC card.

muxBootPromVer.name: muxBootPromVer
muxBootPromVer.description: The current version string of the Mux Boot PROM code

muxROMSize.name: muxROMSize
muxROMSize.description: Total Size of the ROM in Kilobyes

muxNumSubDiv.name: muxNumSubDiv
muxNumSubDiv.description: Number of the subdivisions of the ROM.

muxSubDivTable.name: muxSubDivTable
muxSubDivTable.description: This table represents the number of sub divisions and the size of each subdivision in ROM memory

muxSubDivEntry.name: muxSubDivEntry
muxSubDivEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

muxSubDivIndex.name: muxSubDivIndex
muxSubDivIndex.description: Integer ID of each sub division in the ROM. The order of numbering is from the top of the ROM to the bottom of the ROM.

muxSubDivDescr.name: muxSubDivDescr
muxSubDivDescr.description: Display Name of each Sub Division in ROM

muxSubDivSize.name: muxSubDivSize
muxSubDivSize.description: Size of each sub division in ROM in kilobytes

muxSubDivOffset.name: muxSubDivOffset
muxSubDivOffset.description: Starting address of each sub division in the ROM in HEX notation.

muxNumber.name: muxNumber
muxNumber.description: Number of MUX rows in the following table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

muxTable.name: muxTable
muxTable.description: This table represents the information for each MUX card

muxEntry.name: muxEntry
muxEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

muxCardLocation.name: muxCardLocation
muxCardLocation.description: Location of the module. Valid values are: Local in the same chassis, or remote to this chassis

muxCardShelf.name: muxCardShelf
muxCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in.

muxCardSlot.name: muxCardSlot
muxCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the module is in. The range of valid values range from 1 through 17 depending on the chassis type and the shelf the module is in. To delete this card, set this variable to 0.

muxMfgDate.name: muxMfgDate
muxMfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the module

muxName.name: muxName
muxName.description: User configurable name of the module

muxFWVersionID.name: muxFWVersionID
muxFWVersionID.description: The current version string of the FW code

muxSetState.name: muxSetState
muxSetState.description: Instruct the mux to do a warmboot. A get on this will always return an other.

muxNumPorts.name: muxNumPorts
muxNumPorts.description: Total port numbers on each MUX card. Should be six

muxUpgradeFlag.name: muxUpgradeFlag
muxUpgradeFlag.description: The MUX card's status is upgradable or not.

muxHWName.name: muxHWName
muxHWName.description: Display Hardware name of the mux/dmux Card.

muxPathID.name: muxPathID
muxPathID.description: Upsr Path ID name that this card is associated with. Set input equal NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if there is no card left associate with that path.

muxAdminState.name: muxAdminState
muxAdminState.description: Administrative control over that mux card. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events gets generated.

muxCleiNum.name: muxCleiNum
muxCleiNum.description: CLEI number of the mux/dmux Card.

muxChannelSpacing.name: muxChannelSpacing
muxChannelSpacing.description: ITU channel spacing for the mux/demux card. Only valid for MD100-40 and BD4 Modules.

muxStartItu.name: muxStartItu
muxStartItu.description: First ITU channel supported by the module. Only valid for MD100-40 and BD4 Modules.

muxEndItu.name: muxEndItu
muxEndItu.description: Last ITU channel supported by the module. Only valid for MD100-40 and BD4 Modules.

muxChannelsPerBand.name: muxChannelsPerBand
muxChannelsPerBand.description: Number of channels per optical band supported by the module. Only valid for BD-4 and MD100-40 module.

muxBands.name: muxBands
muxBands.description: Number of bands supported by the module. Only valid for BD-4 and MD100-40 module.

muxPortNumber.name: muxPortNumber
muxPortNumber.description: Number of MUX's port rows in the following table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.Basically a product of # of mux cards and # of ports on each card. Hence it would have a value of 6, 12, 18 etc..

muxPortTable.name: muxPortTable
muxPortTable.description: This table represents the information for each MUX card's port.

muxPortEntry.name: muxPortEntry
muxPortEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

muxPortCardLocation.name: muxPortCardLocation
muxPortCardLocation.description: Location of the MUX's port. Valid values are: Local in the same chassis, or remote to this chassis

muxPortCardShelf.name: muxPortCardShelf
muxPortCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in. Valid values are: 1 to 2.

muxPortCardSlot.name: muxPortCardSlot
muxPortCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card is in.

muxPortIndex.name: muxPortIndex
muxPortIndex.description: Port's index. Ports 1 through 4 can be use for connection with OCM family or MCMT1/MCME1 only.

muxWavelength.name: muxWavelength
muxWavelength.description: Port's wavelength: either ITU number or actual wavelength in nm. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxInsertLoss.name: muxInsertLoss
muxInsertLoss.description: Mux Port insertion Loss range. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnCardType.name: muxConnCardType
muxConnCardType.description: Module type connected to mux port. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnLocation.name: muxConnLocation
muxConnLocation.description: The chassis's location of the card conn to. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnShelf.name: muxConnShelf
muxConnShelf.description: The shelf the card conn to. Valid values are: 1 to 2. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnSlot.name: muxConnSlot
muxConnSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card conn to. To delete a connection associated with a specified port, set this variable to 0. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnPort.name: muxConnPort
muxConnPort.description: Conn port for MUX/DMUX's port. Possible values based on card types that can be connected to are: FADM: 1=Conn A Tx, 2=Conn A Rx, 3=Local Tx 4=Local Rx, 5=Conn B Tx, 6=Conn B Rx OCM10G/OCME/OCMITU/OCMU/MCMT1/MCME1/MCMESC: 1=Link Tx, 2=Link Rx OFCM/OFCD: 1/2/3/4=port index, 5=EXP, 6=OUT/IN OSAM: 1=IN, 2=OUT W2CM/W2CMD:1=13M, 2=15M, 3=13D, 4=15D, 5=IN , 6=OUT W4CM/W4CD: 1=1470/1510, 2=1490/1530, 3=1550/1590, 4=1570/1610, 5=EXP, 6=IN/OUT UPSM/OPPM: 1=Link A Tx, 2=Link A Rx, 3=Link B Tx, 4=Link B Rx, 5=Local Tx, 6=Local Rx. Entry supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxPortType.name: muxPortType
muxPortType.description: Type of the MUX's port. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnChassisID.name: muxConnChassisID
muxConnChassisID.description: Chassis ID of the connected node. User config. If local connection, a set on it would return an error; would be automatically be set to the chassis Id of the local node. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnSystemName.name: muxConnSystemName
muxConnSystemName.description: System Name of the connected node. User config. If local connection, a set on it would return an error; would be automatically be set to the sysetem name of the local node. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxConnIpAddress.name: muxConnIpAddress
muxConnIpAddress.description: IpAddress of the connected node. User config. If local connection, a set on it would return an error; would be automatically be set to the IP address of the node. Supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

muxPortAvgInsertionLoss.name: muxPortAvgInsertionLoss
muxPortAvgInsertionLoss.description: Average port insertion loss for the port category. Valid only for MD100-40 & BD4 modules.

muxPortMaxInsertionLoss.name: muxPortMaxInsertionLoss
muxPortMaxInsertionLoss.description: Maximum port insertion loss for the port category. Valid only for MD100-40 & BD4 modules.

muxPortTapRatio.name: muxPortTapRatio
muxPortTapRatio.description: Tap ratio for the port category. Valid only for MD100-40 & BD4 modules.

psNumber.name: psNumber
psNumber.description: Number of PS (power supply) rows in the following table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

psTable.description: This table represents the information for each PS module.

psEntry.name: psEntry
psEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

psID.description: The module ID the ps module is in. Valid values are: 1 to 4

psMode.name: psMode
psMode.description: Mode of the PS module. Valid values are: active or standby

psMfgDate.name: psMfgDate
psMfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the PS module.

psSerialNum.name: psSerialNum
psSerialNum.description: Serial # of the PS module. Not Supported Yet.

psModelType.name: psModelType
psModelType.description: Model type of the PS module. Up to 10 characters. Not Supported Yet.

dlFtpTable.name: dlFtpTable
dlFtpTable.description: This table represents the information for each FTP server

dlFtpEntry.name: dlFtpEntry
dlFtpEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

dlFtpIp.name: dlFtpIp
dlFtpIp.description: The IP address of the FTP server.

dlFtpLogonID.name: dlFtpLogonID
dlFtpLogonID.description: The FTP user ID for this FTP server. Up to 15 chars.

dlFtpPasswd.name: dlFtpPasswd
dlFtpPasswd.description: Password for the above FTP Logon ID. This password is NOT hashed. Proper security access is required to set and view this element. Most FTP connections, however, are using anonymous logon ID with no special password requirements.

dlFtpMode.name: dlFtpMode
dlFtpMode.description: FTP server modes. The choices are: active or passive, active may be necessary for users behind a firewall.

dlFtpPort.name: dlFtpPort
dlFtpPort.description: FTP port. This port is used in conjunction with the FTP IP address for establishing a connection to the FTP server. Any valid IP port may be entered. Setting this element to zero (0) will cause the standard FTP port (21) to be used.

dlPreQualTable.name: dlPreQualTable
dlPreQualTable.description: This table represents the information for each PreQual table.

dlPreQualEntry.name: dlPreQualEntry
dlPreQualEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

dlPreQualTypeVersion.name: dlPreQualTypeVersion
dlPreQualTypeVersion.description: The Image type and version to be prequalified before downloading. The string format is : type,version. The prequal action will be taken after setting version.

dlPreQualResult.name: dlPreQualResult
dlPreQualResult.description: The result after comparing type and version of the selected download image with the compatibility matrix. The result is either compatible, incompatible or unknown version. (Not available at this time). The default is compatible.

dlDownloadTable.name: dlDownloadTable
dlDownloadTable.description: This table represents the information for download and activation.

dlDownloadEntry.name: dlDownloadEntry
dlDownloadEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

dlType.name: dlType
dlType.description: The Image type to be downloaded or to be activated. The valid values are: all, mpms, boot, macf, mcme1, mcmesc-code, mcmt1, mpm, ocm, ocm10g, oet, osam, osam-hp/lp, rsm, upsm, uob. When choosing all, all non-mpm images are downloaded, the dlLocation should be set to local, dlShelf and dlSlot should be set to 0, dlFilename should be set to the path under which all the non-mpm images are put. When choosing mpms, mpm's two associated images, boot and mpm run code image, are downloaded, the dlLocation should be set to local, dlShelf and dlSlot should be set to active mpm's shelf and slot, dlFilename should be set to the path under which the two images are put. To MCME1/MCMT1 modules, mcm-fpag image will automatically be downloaded when mcme1 or mcmt1 is selected.

dlLocation.name: dlLocation
dlLocation.description: The location to be downloaded or to be activated. The choices are: local, remote or both. (Only local and remote are supported at this time, LuxnOS has only local choice and is not supported yet. When dlType is set to all, only local is supported.

dlShelf.name: dlShelf
dlShelf.description: The destination shelf. When dlType is set to all, dlShelf should be set to 0.

dlSlot.name: dlSlot
dlSlot.description: The slot within the selected shelf. When dlType is set to all, dlSlot should be set to 0.

dlFilename.name: dlFilename
dlFilename.description: The filename and path of the file to be downloaded -up to 255 characters. When dlType is set to all, the dlFilename field should be set to the path of the directory where the non-mpm images are stored. When dlType is set to mpms, the dlFilename field should be set to the path of the directory where the boot and mpm images are stored. The download action (imageupdate) will be taken after setting the dlFilename field.

dlActivate.name: dlActivate
dlActivate.description: Activate the backup image at the selected location. To MCMESC, no, activateBackupFirmware, activateBackupFPGA and activateBackupFirmwareAndFPGA are applicable. To MCMT1/MCME1, no and activateBackupFirmwareAndFPGA are applicable. To other modules, no and activateBackupFirmware are applicable. When choosing activateForAllLineCards, the dlShelf and dlSlot sholud be set to 0.

dlExportType.name: dlExportType
dlExportType.description: The image indicated by dlType is to be exported to the dlFilename using FTP. Ths element is reset to none(1) after each export.

dlOSTable.name: dlOSTable
dlOSTable.description: This table represents the information for LuxnOS table.

dlOSEntry.name: dlOSEntry
dlOSEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

dlOSIndex.name: dlOSIndex
dlOSIndex.description: The Integer ID for each LuxnOS.

dlOSState.name: dlOSState
dlOSState.description: Display the LuxnOS state: operating(1) is the current operating LuxnOS, backup(2)is the backup LuxnOS.

dlOSRelDate.name: dlOSRelDate
dlOSRelDate.description: Display the release date of the LuxnOS.

dlUpdateOS.name: dlUpdateOS
dlUpdateOS.description: Display and select Update LuxnOS Mode: toggle(1) to toggle between operating and backup LuxnOS, revert(2) to copy LuxnOS from the backup to the operating area. The action will be taken after setting UpdateOS .

mcmTimingPriority.name: mcmTimingPriority
mcmTimingPriority.description: The clock source priority in descending order in the format of a,b,c,d,e,f in which a through f should be replaced with 1 through 6 which has the same meaning as the options of mcmTimingPort and are repeated as follows: 0 - unknown 1 - internal 2 - link 3 - t1Port1 4 - t1Port2 5 - t1Port3 6 - t1Port4 For example, '2,5,4,6,3,1' will set the priority of the clock source with link first, followed by t1Port3, followed by t1Port2, followed by t1Port4, followed by t1Port1, followed by internal.

mcmLinkName.name: mcmLinkName
mcmLinkName.description: User configurable Link name for the connection between the local and remote MCM/MCME1 Modules

mcmEthernetMode.name: mcmEthernetMode
mcmEthernetMode.description: This allows the ethernet mode configured as auto detect, forced 10M, or forced 100M.

mcmCleiNum.description: CLEI number of the mcmt1/mcme1 Card.

mcmPortCardLocation.description: Location of the MCMT1/MCME1 port. Valid values are: Local in the same chassis, or remote to this chassis

mcmPortCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in. Valid values are: 1..2.

mcmPortCardSlot.name: mcmPortCardSlot
mcmPortCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the Module is in. Valid values are: 1 to 17

mcmPortFraming.name: mcmPortFraming
mcmPortFraming.description: Type of framing. esf(1) and d4(2) are for mcmt1. crc4(3) is for mcme1. For mcme1, this release of hardware and software only supports fixed configuration, CRC4, hence, operation of setting will return an error.

mcmPortLineCoding.name: mcmPortLineCoding
mcmPortLineCoding.description: Type of line coding. b8zs(1) and ami(2) are for mcmt1. hdb3(3) is for mcme1. For mcme1, this release of hardware and software only supports fixed configuration, HDB3, hence, operation of setting will return an error.

mcmPortLineEqualizer.name: mcmPortLineEqualizer
mcmPortLineEqualizer.description: The Line equilizer. ft0to133(1), ft133to266(2), ft266to399(3), ft399to533(4), and ft533to655(5) are for mcmt1. minus43dB(6) is for mcme1. For mcme1, this release of hardware and software only supports fixed configuration, -43dB, hence, operation of setting will return an error.

mcmPortImpedance.name: mcmPortImpedance
mcmPortImpedance.description: Port impedance. ohms-100(1) is for mcmt1. ohms-75(2) and ohms-120(3) are for mcme1. For mcme1, this release of hardware and software only supports fixed configuration, 75 ohm, hence, operation of setting will return an error.

csimSysMode.description: The ColorSim Mode of the Chassis. The value Enable means that the ColorSim feature is enabled for all the interface cards. An action element, returns other on a get request.

csimUpdtIntvl.description: Number of gating intervals to be processed before the data is logged for reporting purposes.

csimSEIThreshold.name: csimSEIThreshold
csimSEIThreshold.description: The SEI Threshold of ColorSIM specifies the maximum number of errored bits that may have occurred during a single gating interval before the interval is considered Severely Errorred. The Threshold values are in the form of x.ye-z.

osamCardSlot.description: The slot number in which the module is plugged in. If a 0 is written into this mib element, the module will be deleted from the system.

osamModelNum.name: osamModelNum
osamModelNum.description: Manufacturing model number of the module.

osamSerialNum.name: osamSerialNum
osamSerialNum.description: Unique serial number of the module.

osamHWName.description: Manufacturing Hardware name of the module.

osamFWVersionID.description: The current firmware version string of the module.

osamFWDate.name: osamFWDate
osamFWDate.description: Release date for the firmware of the module.

osamCardName.name: osamCardName
osamCardName.description: User configurable card name for the module.

osamSetState.name: osamSetState
osamSetState.description: Instruct the osam module to do a reset. A get on this will always return other.

osamLaserState.name: osamLaserState
osamLaserState.description: The operational state of the laser.

osamOperationMode.name: osamOperationMode
osamOperationMode.description: Operation mode of the module. powerControlled(3) is not supported by OSAM modules. currentControlled(1) is not supported OSAM-HP/LP modules.

osamLaserBiasCurrent.name: osamLaserBiasCurrent
osamLaserBiasCurrent.description: Constant current in mA to be used by the module when the operation mode is set to currentControlled. This value can't be set if operation mode is set to gainControlled. Applicable only to OSAM module

osamAmplifierGain.name: osamAmplifierGain
osamAmplifierGain.description: Constant gain in dB to be used by the module when the operation mode is set to gainControlled. This value can't be set if operation mode is set to currentControlled. Not applicable to OSAM-HP/LP module

osamConfigCommit.name: osamConfigCommit
osamConfigCommit.description: This allows the current module configuration to be stored in permanent storage.

osamNoiseFigure.name: osamNoiseFigure
osamNoiseFigure.description: The calibrated noise figure of the gain block in dB. Applicable only to OSAM module

osamPathID.name: osamPathID
osamPathID.description: Upsr Path ID name that this card is associated with. Set input equal NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if there is no card left associate with that path.

osamAdminState.name: osamAdminState
osamAdminState.description: Administrative control over that osam card. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events gets generated.

osam2NoiseFigure.name: osam2NoiseFigure
osam2NoiseFigure.description: The calibrated noise figure of the gain block in dBm. Applicable only to OSAM-HP/LP module

osam2GainReq.name: osam2GainReq
osam2GainReq.description: Constant gain in dB to be used by the module when the operation mode is set to gainControlled. This value can't be set if operation mode is set to powerControlled. Range is 0-16.5db(LP) and 0-23.3db(HP) Applicable only to OSAM-HP/LP module

osam2OpPowerReq.name: osam2OpPowerReq
osam2OpPowerReq.description: Constant output power in dBm to be used by the module when the operation mode is set to powerControlled. This value can't be set if operation mode is set to gainControlled. Range is 0-9dbm (LP) and 0-18dbm(HP) Applicable only to OSAM-HP/LP module

osamCleiNum.name: osamCleiNum
osamCleiNum.description: CLEI number of the osam Card.

osamNumPorts.name: osamNumPorts
osamNumPorts.description: Total port numbers on each OSAM card.

osamPortTable.name: osamPortTable
osamPortTable.description: This table represents the physical connection for each OSAM card's port.

osamPortEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

osamPortCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in. Valid values are: 1 to 2.

osamPortCardSlot.name: osamPortCardSlot
osamPortCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card is in.

osamConnCardType.name: osamConnCardType
osamConnCardType.description: Module type connectioned to osam port.

osamConnPort.description: Conn port for OSAM's port. Possible values based on card types that can be connected to OSAM are: FADM: 1=Conn A Tx, 2=Conn A Rx, 3=Local Tx 4=Local Rx, 5=Conn B Tx, 6=Conn B Rx OCM10G/OCME/OCMITU/OCMU/MCMT1/MCME1: 1=Link Tx, 2=Link Rx OFCM/OFCD: 1/2/3/4=port index, 5=EXP, 6=OUT/IN OSAM: 1=IN, 2=OUT W2CM/W2CMD:1=13M, 2=15M, 3=13D, 4=15D, 5=IN , 6=OUT W4CM/W4CD: 1=1470/1510, 2=1490/1530, 3=1550/1590, 4=1570/1610, 5=EXP, 6=IN/OUT UPSM/OPPM: 1=Link A Tx, 2=Link A Rx, 3=Link B Tx, 4=Link B Rx, 5=Local Tx, 6=Local Rx.

osamConnSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card conn to. To delete a connection associated with a specified port, set this variable to 0.

upsmMarginForSwitch.name: upsmMarginForSwitch
upsmMarginForSwitch.description: The UPSM switching threshold for protection switch to occur. The limit is from -32 to -6. Switching threshold must be 1 dBm or more less than the minimum switch power.

upsmMinProtPowerForSwitch.name: upsmMinProtPowerForSwitch
upsmMinProtPowerForSwitch.description: The minimum protection link power to allow protection switch to function. The limit is from -30 to -5. This value should be 1 dBm or more greater than the switch margin.

upsmDebounce.name: upsmDebounce
upsmDebounce.description: The number of times to measure low power condition before performing protection switch.

upsmBlackOutTime.name: upsmBlackOutTime
upsmBlackOutTime.description: The time after protection switch before allowing another protection switch.

upsmSwitch.name: upsmSwitch
upsmSwitch.description: The Link switch control. switchToLinkA or switchToLinkB option would disable auto switch functionality. Auto switch functionality can be turned on by setting to enableAutoSwitch option

upsmSwitchState.name: upsmSwitchState

mcmescAdminState.description: Administrative control over that MCMESC card. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events gets generated.

mcmescLinkName.name: mcmescLinkName
mcmescLinkName.description: Link name for fiber between the local and the remote MCMESC card.

mcmescPathID.name: mcmescPathID
mcmescPathID.description: Upsr Path ID name that this card is associated with. Set input equal NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if there is no card left associate with that path.

mcmescOverride.name: mcmescOverride
mcmescOverride.description: MPM overrides the settings stored on MCMESC card upon detecting it. Default value is no. Not applicable to remote MCMESC.

mcmescPerfInterval.name: mcmescPerfInterval
mcmescPerfInterval.description: The interval, in seconds, in which MCMESC collects the performance data, ranging 60 to 3600.

mcmescCpeRxSigLowThreshold.name: mcmescCpeRxSigLowThreshold
mcmescCpeRxSigLowThreshold.description: The threshold of reporting CPE port Rx signal low alarm, in dBm, ranging from -29 to -7.

mcmescLinkRxSigLowThreshold.name: mcmescLinkRxSigLowThreshold
mcmescLinkRxSigLowThreshold.description: The threshold of reporting Link Rx signal low alarm, in dBm, ranging from -29 to -7.

mcmescCpeErrEventThreshold.name: mcmescCpeErrEventThreshold
mcmescCpeErrEventThreshold.description: The threshold of reporting CPE error event, in the form of 1.0E-x. Only x needs to be set and will be read. The range of x is from 5 to 15, however, input should be an absolute value if using mib browser. This threshold should be lower than the value of mcmescCpeErrAlarmThreshold, i.e., the absolute value should be higher than of mcmescCpeErrAlarmThreshold.

mcmescCpeErrAlarmThreshold.name: mcmescCpeErrAlarmThreshold
mcmescCpeErrAlarmThreshold.description: The threshold of reporting CPE error alarm, in the form of 1.0E-x. The range of x is from 4 to 14, however, input should be an absolute value if using mib browser. This threshold should be higher than the value of mcmescCpeErrEventThreshold, i.e., the absolute value should be lower than of mcmescCpeErrEventThreshold.

mcmescLinkErrEventThreshold.name: mcmescLinkErrEventThreshold
mcmescLinkErrEventThreshold.description: The threshold of reporting LINK error event, in the form of 1.0E-x. The range of x is from 5 to 15, however, input should be an absolute value if using mib browser. This threshold should be lower than the value of mcmescLinkErrAlarmThreshold, i.e., the absolute value should be higher than of mcmescLinkErrAlarmThreshold.

mcmescLinkErrAlarmThreshold.name: mcmescLinkErrAlarmThreshold
mcmescLinkErrAlarmThreshold.description: The threshold of reporting LINK error alarm, in the form of 1.0E-x. The range of x is from 4 to 14, however, input should be an absolute value if using mib browser. This threshold should be higher than the value of mcmescLinkErrEventThreshold, i.e., the absolute value should be lower than of mcmescLinkErrEventThreshold.

mcmescTestSequence.name: mcmescTestSequence
mcmescTestSequence.description: Turn on or off the test-sequence on link. The operation will take place on the remote MCMESC if it's connected.

mcmescConnMuxPort.name: mcmescConnMuxPort
mcmescConnMuxPort.description: The connected W4CM/UPSM port. W4CM: 1=1470/1510, 2=1490/1530, 3=15501590/, 4=1570/1610, 5=EXP, 6=IN/OUT; UPSM: 1=Link A Tx, 2=Link A Rx, 3=Link B Tx, 4=Link B Rx, 5=Local Tx, 6=Local Rx.

mcmescConnDemuxPort.name: mcmescConnDemuxPort
mcmescConnDemuxPort.description: The connected W4CD/UPSM port. W4CD: 1=1470/1510, 2=1490/1530, 3=15501590/, 4=1570/1610, 5=EXP, 6=IN/OUT; UPSM: 1=Link A Tx, 2=Link A Rx, 3=Link B Tx, 4=Link B Rx, 5=Local Tx, 6=Local Rx.

mcmescConnTxOcmShelf.name: mcmescConnTxOcmShelf
mcmescConnTxOcmShelf.description: The connected OCM shelf (from MCMESC's Link Tx).

mcmescConnTxOcmSlot.name: mcmescConnTxOcmSlot
mcmescConnTxOcmSlot.description: The connected OCM slot (from MCMESC's Link Tx).

mcmescConnTxOcmPort.name: mcmescConnTxOcmPort
mcmescConnTxOcmPort.description: The connected OCM port (from MCMESC's Link Tx). 3=OCM's CPE-Tx, 4=OCM's Rx. Only 4 is valid.

mcmescConnTxOcmShelfSlot.name: mcmescConnTxOcmShelfSlot
mcmescConnTxOcmShelfSlot.description: Add a connection from MCMESC Link-Tx to an OCM CPE-Rx by specifying the OCM's shelf and slot. The format is shlef,slot. If either MCMESC Link-Tx or specified OCM CPE-Rx has already had connection, an error will be returned. If the card specified by shelf,slot is not ocm type, an error will be returned. A get on this variable will always return 0,0.

mcmescConnTxOcmDelete.name: mcmescConnTxOcmDelete
mcmescConnTxOcmDelete.description: Delete a connection from MCMESC Link-Tx to an OCM CPE-Rx. If MCMESC's Link-Tx has no connection with any OCM's CPE-Rx, an error will be returned. A get on this variable will always return an other.

mcmescConnRxOcmShelf.name: mcmescConnRxOcmShelf
mcmescConnRxOcmShelf.description: The connected OCM shelf (from MCMESC's Link Rx).

mcmescConnRxOcmSlot.name: mcmescConnRxOcmSlot
mcmescConnRxOcmSlot.description: The connected OCM slot (from MCMESC's Link Rx).

mcmescConnRxOcmPort.name: mcmescConnRxOcmPort
mcmescConnRxOcmPort.description: The connected OCM port (from MCMESC's Link Rx). 3=OCM's CPE-Tx, 4=OCM's Rx. Only 3 is valid.

mcmescConnRxOcmShelfSlot.name: mcmescConnRxOcmShelfSlot
mcmescConnRxOcmShelfSlot.description: Add a connection from MCMESC Link-Rx to an OCM CPE-Tx by specifying the OCM's shelf and slot. The format is shlef,slot. If either MCMESC Link-Tx or specified OCM CPE-Rx has already had connection, an error will be returned. If the card specified by shelf,slot is not ocm type, an error will be returned. A get on this variable will always return 0,0

mcmescConnRxOcmDelete.name: mcmescConnRxOcmDelete
mcmescConnRxOcmDelete.description: Delete a connection from MCMESC Link-Rx to an OCM CPE-Tx. If MCMESC's Link-Rx has no connection with any OCM's CPE-Tx, an error will be returned. A get on this variable will always return an other.

mcmescSetState.name: mcmescSetState
mcmescSetState.description: Instruct the mcmesc card to do either a reset or loopback. A get on this will always return an other. If the card is in self-test, an error will be returned. If the card is already in any loopback, and try to turn on another loopback, an error will be returned.

mcmescLinkClrErrCount.name: mcmescLinkClrErrCount
mcmescLinkClrErrCount.description: Instruct the mcmesc card to clear the bit-error count for link port. A get on this will always return an other.

mcmescPortNumber.name: mcmescPortNumber
mcmescPortNumber.description: Number of MCMESC rows in the following table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

mcmescPortTable.name: mcmescPortTable
mcmescPortTable.description: This table represents the information for each MCMESC module's port.

mcmescPortEntry.name: mcmescPortEntry
mcmescPortEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

mcmescPortCardLocation.name: mcmescPortCardLocation
mcmescPortCardLocation.description: Location of the MCMESC port. Valid values are: Local in the same chassis, or remote to this chassis.

mcmescPortCardShelf.name: mcmescPortCardShelf
mcmescPortCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in. Valid values are: 1..2.

mcmescPortCardSlot.name: mcmescPortCardSlot
mcmescPortCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the Module is in. Valid values are: 1 to 17.

mcmescPortIndex.name: mcmescPortIndex
mcmescPortIndex.description: CPE port's index. Valid values are: 1 to 12.

mcmescPortClrErrCount.name: mcmescPortClrErrCount
mcmescPortClrErrCount.description: Instruct the mcmesc card to clear the bit-error count for a CPE port. A get on this will always return an other.

topologyTable.name: topologyTable
topologyTable.description: This table represents the link topology between local and remote cards

topologyEntry.name: topologyEntry
topologyEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

topologyNearEndCardShelf.name: topologyNearEndCardShelf
topologyNearEndCardShelf.description: Shelf of the near end card.

topologyNearEndCardSlot.name: topologyNearEndCardSlot
topologyNearEndCardSlot.description: Slot of the near end card. Input 0 will delete the topology link.

topologyNearEndCardType.name: topologyNearEndCardType
topologyNearEndCardType.description: Card type of the near end card.

topologyFarEndChassisID.name: topologyFarEndChassisID
topologyFarEndChassisID.description: Chassis ID of the far end chassis. Part of manufacturing info

topologyFarEndSystemName.name: topologyFarEndSystemName
topologyFarEndSystemName.description: Name of the far end node/chassis. Not supported for remote TMM masters.

topologyFarEndNodeIpAddress.name: topologyFarEndNodeIpAddress
topologyFarEndNodeIpAddress.description: IpAddress of the far end chassis. Not supported for remote TMM masters.

topologyFarEndNodeCardShelf.name: topologyFarEndNodeCardShelf
topologyFarEndNodeCardShelf.description: Shelf of the far end module

topologyFarEndNodeCardSlot.name: topologyFarEndNodeCardSlot
topologyFarEndNodeCardSlot.description: Slot of the far end module

topologyLinkStatus.name: topologyLinkStatus
topologyLinkStatus.description: Status of the link to indicate if active or down

topologyFarEndNodeCardType.name: topologyFarEndNodeCardType
topologyFarEndNodeCardType.description: Card type of the far end card.

topologyDiscover.name: topologyDiscover
topologyDiscover.description: An action to rediscover the complete topology A get would alway return other(1).

routingTable.name: routingTable
routingTable.description: This table represents dynamic and static routing information

routingEntry.name: routingEntry
routingEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

routeLocalCCShelf.name: routeLocalCCShelf
routeLocalCCShelf.description: Shelf of the local CC card.

routeLocalCCSlot.name: routeLocalCCSlot
routeLocalCCSlot.description: Slot of the local CC card.

routeIpDestAddress.name: routeIpDestAddress
routeIpDestAddress.description: Destination IP address. Not supported for remote TMM masters.

routeDestType.name: routeDestType
routeDestType.description: Destination route type. External means destination is not part of LuxN network. Internal means destination is one of the LuxN node

routeMode.name: routeMode
routeMode.description: Is the route added statically(manually) or dynamically(automatic)

imnDynamicRoutingTable.name: imnDynamicRoutingTable
imnDynamicRoutingTable.description: This table represents IMN based dynamic routing information

imnDynamicRoutingEntry.name: imnDynamicRoutingEntry
imnDynamicRoutingEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

imnDynamicRouteIpDest.name: imnDynamicRouteIpDest
imnDynamicRouteIpDest.description: Destination IP address. Not supported for remote TMM masters.

imnDynamicRouteIpMask.name: imnDynamicRouteIpMask
imnDynamicRouteIpMask.description: Destination's IP mask address. Not supported for remote TMM masters.

imnDynamicRouteSysName.name: imnDynamicRouteSysName
imnDynamicRouteSysName.description: Destination system name associated with route.

imnRouteUpdateTimer.name: imnRouteUpdateTimer
imnRouteUpdateTimer.description: Time in seconds for the route table to get updated/propagated Default value is 30 seconds.

imnRouteKeepAliveTimer.name: imnRouteKeepAliveTimer
imnRouteKeepAliveTimer.description: Time in seconds before neighbors enter unreachable state after communication is lost. This value has to be greater than or equal to imnRouteUpdateTimer Default value is 60 seconds

imnRouteUnReachableTimer.name: imnRouteUnReachableTimer
imnRouteUnReachableTimer.description: Time in seconds before Neighbors in unreachable state are deleted from the route table. This value has to greater than or equal to imnRouteUpdateTimer Default value is 60 seconds

imnRouteMode.name: imnRouteMode
imnRouteMode.description: Enable/Disable IMN functionality. Default is disabled

imnStaticRoutingTable.name: imnStaticRoutingTable
imnStaticRoutingTable.description: This table represents IMN based static routing information

imnStaticRoutingEntry.name: imnStaticRoutingEntry
imnStaticRoutingEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

imnStaticRouteIpDest.name: imnStaticRouteIpDest
imnStaticRouteIpDest.description: Destination IP address. Not supported for remote TMM masters.

imnStaticRouteIpMask.name: imnStaticRouteIpMask
imnStaticRouteIpMask.description: Destination's IP mask address. Not supported for remote TMM masters.

imnRouteMaxMetric.name: imnRouteMaxMetric
imnRouteMaxMetric.description: Maximum acceptable metric count before the routes gets dropped. Default value is 255. Ideally this value should be greater than imnStaticRouteMetric

ringNum.name: ringNum
ringNum.description: Total number of ring configured in the list.

ringTable.name: ringTable
ringTable.description: This table represent the ring information

ringEntry.name: ringEntry
ringEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

ringIndex.name: ringIndex
ringIndex.description: The ringIndex and also the index of the ring table.

ringID.name: ringID
ringID.description: RingID Name for UPSR. Empty string will remove and deassociate the RingID with the PathIDs. You always has one dummy entry for adding another ring.

ringPath1RemoteIP.name: ringPath1RemoteIP
ringPath1RemoteIP.description: IP Address of the neighbor node associated with path 1

ringPath1RemoteChassisId.name: ringPath1RemoteChassisId
ringPath1RemoteChassisId.description: Chassis ID of the neighbor node associated with path 1

ringPath2RemoteIP.name: ringPath2RemoteIP
ringPath2RemoteIP.description: IP Address of the neighbor node associated with path 2

ringPath2RemoteChassisId.name: ringPath2RemoteChassisId
ringPath2RemoteChassisId.description: Chassis ID of the neighbor node associated with path 2

tapNumber.name: tapNumber
tapNumber.description: Number of TAP rows in the following table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

tapTable.name: tapTable
tapTable.description: This table represents the information for each TAP module

tapEntry.name: tapEntry
tapEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

tapCardLocation.name: tapCardLocation
tapCardLocation.description: Location of the module. Valid values are: Local in the same chassis, or remote to this chassis

tapCardShelf.name: tapCardShelf
tapCardShelf.description: The shelf the card is in.

tapCardSlot.name: tapCardSlot
tapCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the module is in. The range of valid values range from 1 through 17 depending on the chassis type and the shelf the module is in. To delete this card, set this variable to 0.

tapMfgDate.name: tapMfgDate
tapMfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the module

tapName.name: tapName
tapName.description: User configurable name of the module

tapFWVersionID.name: tapFWVersionID
tapFWVersionID.description: The current version string of the FW code

tapHWName.name: tapHWName
tapHWName.description: Display Hardware name of the module.

tapPathID.name: tapPathID
tapPathID.description: Upsr Path ID name that this card is associated with. Set input equal NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if there is no card left associate with that path.

tapAdminState.name: tapAdminState
tapAdminState.description: Administrative control over that TAP card. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events gets generated.

tapNumPorts.name: tapNumPorts
tapNumPorts.description: Total port numbers on each TAP card.

voadmNumber.name: voadmNumber
voadmNumber.description: Number of rows in the voadm table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

voadmTable.name: voadmTable
voadmTable.description: This table represents the information for each VOADM card

voadmEntry.name: voadmEntry
voadmEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

voadmCardLocation.name: voadmCardLocation
voadmCardLocation.description: Location of the module. VOADM modules will always be seen as local modules.

voadmCardShelf.name: voadmCardShelf
voadmCardShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

voadmCardSlot.name: voadmCardSlot
voadmCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf where the module resides. The range of valid values range from 1 through 17 depending on the chassis type and the shelf where the module is in. To delete this card, set this variable to 0.

voadmMfgDate.name: voadmMfgDate
voadmMfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the module

voadmAdminState.name: voadmAdminState
voadmAdminState.description: Administrative control for the module. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events are generated for the module.

voadmName.name: voadmName
voadmName.description: User configurable name of the module.

voadmSetState.name: voadmSetState
voadmSetState.description: Instruct the module to do a warmboot. A get on this will always return 'other'.

voadmPathID.name: voadmPathID
voadmPathID.description: Path ID name associated with the module. Set input equal to NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if no other modules are associated with that path.

voadmActiveChannels.name: voadmActiveChannels
voadmActiveChannels.description: Number of active channels connected to the module. The allowed inpu range depends on the module type: MD100-5 1 to 5 MD100-10 1 to 10

voadmStartItu.name: voadmStartItu
voadmStartItu.description: First ITU channel supported by the module.

voadmEndItu.name: voadmEndItu
voadmEndItu.description: Last ITU channel supported by the module.

voadmNumPorts.name: voadmNumPorts
voadmNumPorts.description: Total port numbers on each VOADM card.

voadmPortTable.name: voadmPortTable
voadmPortTable.description: This table represents the information for each set of ports on the module. Ports are divided into two sets: mux ports and demux ports.

voadmPortEntry.name: voadmPortEntry
voadmPortEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

voadmPortCardLocation.name: voadmPortCardLocation
voadmPortCardLocation.description: Location of the module. VOADM modules will always be seen as local modules.

voadmPortCardShelf.name: voadmPortCardShelf
voadmPortCardShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

voadmPortCardSlot.name: voadmPortCardSlot
voadmPortCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf where the module resides.

voadmPortType.name: voadmPortType
voadmPortType.description: Port type for which the below values apply.

voadmPortMode.name: voadmPortMode
voadmPortMode.description: Port mode. This value will not be stored in the database until the port set point is set.

voadmPortSetPoint.name: voadmPortSetPoint
voadmPortSetPoint.description: Port set point. Valid range depends on the port mode: Fixed Attentuation 0.0 to 20.0 (dB) Fixed Power -30.0 to 15.0 (dBm) Untils are omitted when setting.

voadmPortMinChanInputPower.name: voadmPortMinChanInputPower
voadmPortMinChanInputPower.description: Minimum input power for each active channel. Valid range for Mux and Demux ports is -30.0 to 15.0 dBm

voadmPortMinChanOutputPower.name: voadmPortMinChanOutputPower
voadmPortMinChanOutputPower.description: Minimum output power for each active channel. Valid range depends on port: Mux -20.0 to 15.0 dBm Demux -30.0 to -8.0 dBm.

voadmPortMaxChanOutputPower.name: voadmPortMaxChanOutputPower
voadmPortMaxChanOutputPower.description: Maximum output power for each active channel. Valid range depends on port: Mux -20.0 to 15.0 dBm Demux -30.0 to -8.0 dBm.

voadmPortToleranceUpperBound.name: voadmPortToleranceUpperBound
voadmPortToleranceUpperBound.description: Upper bound for allowable power/attenuation error. Valid range is 0.2 to 10.0 dB.

voadmPortToleranceLowerBound.name: voadmPortToleranceLowerBound
voadmPortToleranceLowerBound.description: Lower bound for allowable power/attenuation error. Valid range is 0.2 to 10.0 dB.

voadmPortTotalInputPower.name: voadmPortTotalInputPower
voadmPortTotalInputPower.description: Power reading from input detector. Valid range: -30 to 15 dBm

voadmPortPerChanInputPower.name: voadmPortPerChanInputPower
voadmPortPerChanInputPower.description: Total input power divided by number of active channels. Valid range: -30 to 15 dBm

voadmPortTotalOutputPower.name: voadmPortTotalOutputPower
voadmPortTotalOutputPower.description: Power reading from output detector. Valid range: -30 to 15 dBm

voadmPortPerChanOutputPower.name: voadmPortPerChanOutputPower
voadmPortPerChanOutputPower.description: Total output power divided by number of active channels. Valid range: -30 to 15 dBm

voadmPortMeasuredAtten.name: voadmPortMeasuredAtten
voadmPortMeasuredAtten.description: Difference between total input power and total output power.

zmsConfigSyncExists.name: zmsConfigSyncExists
zmsConfigSyncExists.description: Indicates whether or not there exists records to be sent to the ZMS config synch manager for changes that have been made by CLI/HTTP to the data base.

zmsConfigSyncOverflow.name: zmsConfigSyncOverflow
zmsConfigSyncOverflow.description: Indicates whether or not the device had to discard update data base records due to resource constraints. If TRUE, traps will be sent to the ZMS Config Synch Manager indicating a download of the entire data base is required.

zmsConfigSyncPriority.name: zmsConfigSyncPriority
zmsConfigSyncPriority.description: Indicates the highest priority configuration synchronization trap outstanding. This flag is set to none at boot time and whenever a file of synchronization changes has been sent to ZMS. If a parameter change has been made to either the same or lower prioirty, the device does not have to send a change notification to ZMS. Higher priority fields must immediately cause traps to be sent to ZMS.

zmsConfigSyncAction.name: zmsConfigSyncAction
zmsConfigSyncAction.description: Used by ZMS when it wants to create a list of config synch records. It must first write the filename expected and then set the action. The create list action allows the device to determine whether the complete database (synchoverflow occured) needs to be sent or only those records that have been modified. create full list specifies that ZMS would like to receive the complete database.

zmsConfigSyncFileName.name: zmsConfigSyncFileName
zmsConfigSyncFileName.description: File Name to be used when creating the config synch records.

zmsConfigSyncStatus.name: zmsConfigSyncStatus
zmsConfigSyncStatus.description: Used by Config Sync Acgent when processing a request to create a list of config synch records.

zmsConfigSyncUserName.name: zmsConfigSyncUserName
zmsConfigSyncUserName.description: User Name to be used when sending the config synch records. When read, the last user name is returned.

zmsConfigSyncUserPassword.name: zmsConfigSyncUserPassword
zmsConfigSyncUserPassword.description: Password to be used when sending the config synch records. For use in FTP authentication. When read, always returns the NULL string

zmsIpAddress.name: zmsIpAddress
zmsIpAddress.description: This is the ZMS IP address for which configuration synchronization messages and any other special handling is performed.

dmmNumber.name: dmmNumber
dmmNumber.description: Number of rows in the dmm table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

dmmTable.name: dmmTable
dmmTable.description: This table represents the information for each DMM card

dmmEntry.name: dmmEntry
dmmEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

dmmCardShelf.name: dmmCardShelf
dmmCardShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

dmmCardSlot.name: dmmCardSlot
dmmCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf where the module resides. The range of valid values range from 1 through 17 depending on the chassis type and the shelf where the module is in. To delete this card, set this variable to 0.

dmmMfgDate.name: dmmMfgDate
dmmMfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the module

dmmAdminState.name: dmmAdminState
dmmAdminState.description: Administrative control for the module. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events are generated for the module.

dmmName.name: dmmName
dmmName.description: User configurable name of the module.

dmmSetState.name: dmmSetState
dmmSetState.description: Instruct the module to do a warmboot. A get on this will always return 'other'.

dmmPathID.name: dmmPathID
dmmPathID.description: Path ID name associated with the module. Set input equal to NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if no other modules are associated with that path.

dmmLinkName.name: dmmLinkName
dmmLinkName.description: Link name for fiber between the local and the remote card.

dmmNumPorts.name: dmmNumPorts
dmmNumPorts.description: Total port numbers on each DMM card.

dmmPortTable.name: dmmPortTable
dmmPortTable.description: This table represents the information for each set of ports on the module. Ports are divided into two sets: mux ports and demux ports.

dmmPortEntry.name: dmmPortEntry
dmmPortEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

dmmPortShelf.name: dmmPortShelf
dmmPortShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

dmmPortSlot.name: dmmPortSlot
dmmPortSlot.description: The slot within the shelf where the module resides.

dmmPortIndex.name: dmmPortIndex
dmmPortIndex.description: Port for which the below values apply.

dmmPortLineRate.name: dmmPortLineRate
dmmPortLineRate.description: Port line rate. Valid only for ports 1 and 2.

dmmPortAutoDisable.name: dmmPortAutoDisable
dmmPortAutoDisable.description: Flag to enable/disable the CPE link when a fault is detected. Far end CPE disable is identical to normal CPE disable with the added feature that the local CPE Tx will be disabled if a loss of light condition is detected on the remote CPE Rx.

dmmPortItu.name: dmmPortItu
dmmPortItu.description: Port ITU number. The ITU number is determined from the SFP wavelength.

dmmPortRxPower.name: dmmPortRxPower
dmmPortRxPower.description: Receive power reported by port SFP.

dmmPortTxReach.name: dmmPortTxReach
dmmPortTxReach.description: Optical reach in meters reported by port SFP.

dmmConnTable.name: dmmConnTable
dmmConnTable.description: This table represents the information for each set of ports on the module. Ports are divided into two sets: mux ports and demux ports.

dmmConnEntry.name: dmmConnEntry
dmmConnEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

dmmConnCardShelf.name: dmmConnCardShelf
dmmConnCardShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

dmmConnCardSlot.name: dmmConnCardSlot
dmmConnCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf where the module resides.

dmmConnCardPortType.name: dmmConnCardPortType
dmmConnCardPortType.description: Port for which the below values apply.

dmmConnLocation.name: dmmConnLocation
dmmConnLocation.description: The chassis location of the card connected to this port.

dmmConnShelf.name: dmmConnShelf
dmmConnShelf.description: The shelf of the card connected to this port

dmmConnSlot.name: dmmConnSlot
dmmConnSlot.description: The slot of the card connected to this port

dmmConnPort.name: dmmConnPort
dmmConnPort.description: Conn port for the DMM's port. Possible values based on card types that can be connected to are: FADM: 1=Conn A Tx, 2=Conn A Rx, 3=Local Tx 4=Local Rx, 5=Conn B Tx, 6=Conn B Rx OCM10G/OCME/OCMITU/OCMU/MCMT1/MCME1/MCMESC: 1=Link Tx, 2=Link Rx OFCM/OFCD: 1/2/3/4=port index, 5=EXP, 6=OUT/IN OSAM: 1=IN, 2=OUT W2CM/W2CMD:1=13M, 2=15M, 3=13D, 4=15D, 5=IN , 6=OUT W4CM/W4CD: 1=1470/1510, 2=1490/1530, 3=1550/1590, 4=1570/1610, 5=EXP, 6=IN/OUT UPSM/OPPM: 1=Link A Tx, 2=Link A Rx, 3=Link B Tx, 4=Link B Rx, 5=Local Tx, 6=Local Rx. Entry supported by all Mux modules except MD100-40 & BD4.

ocm10gfNumber.name: ocm10gfNumber
ocm10gfNumber.description: Number of rows in the ocm10gf table. This number is automatically updated whenever a new row is added to the table below.

ocm10gfTable.name: ocm10gfTable
ocm10gfTable.description: This table represents the information for each OCM10GF card

ocm10gfEntry.name: ocm10gfEntry
ocm10gfEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

ocm10gfCardShelf.name: ocm10gfCardShelf
ocm10gfCardShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

ocm10gfCardSlot.name: ocm10gfCardSlot
ocm10gfCardSlot.description: The slot within the shelf where the module resides. The range of valid values range from 1 through 17 depending on the chassis type and the shelf where the module is in. To delete this card, set this variable to 0.

ocm10gfMfgDate.name: ocm10gfMfgDate
ocm10gfMfgDate.description: Date and Time of manufacturing of the module

ocm10gfName.name: ocm10gfName
ocm10gfName.description: User configurable name of the module.

ocm10gfLineRate.name: ocm10gfLineRate
ocm10gfLineRate.description: Port line rate. Valid only for ports 1 and 2.

ocm10gfAutoDisable.name: ocm10gfAutoDisable
ocm10gfAutoDisable.description: Flag to enable/disable the CPE link when a fault is detected. Far end CPE disable is identical to normal CPE disable with the added feature that the local CPE Tx will be disabled if a loss of light condition is detected on the remote CPE Rx.

ocm10gfLinkName.name: ocm10gfLinkName
ocm10gfLinkName.description: Link name for fiber between the local and the remote card.

ocm10gfPathID.name: ocm10gfPathID
ocm10gfPathID.description: Path ID name associated with the module. Set input equal to NULL will remove the card off the path and also remove the path if no other modules are associated with that path.

ocm10gfAdminState.name: ocm10gfAdminState
ocm10gfAdminState.description: Administrative control for the module. Default value is enable. When disabled, no alarms/events are generated for the module.

ocm10gfSetState.name: ocm10gfSetState
ocm10gfSetState.description: Instruct the module to do a warmboot. A get on this will always return 'other'.

ocm10gfNumPorts.name: ocm10gfNumPorts
ocm10gfNumPorts.description: Total port numbers on each OCM10GF card.

ocm10gfPortTable.name: ocm10gfPortTable
ocm10gfPortTable.description: This table represents the information for each set of ports on the module. Ports are divided into two sets: mux ports and demux ports.

ocm10gfPortEntry.name: ocm10gfPortEntry
ocm10gfPortEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

ocm10gfPortShelf.name: ocm10gfPortShelf
ocm10gfPortShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

ocm10gfPortSlot.name: ocm10gfPortSlot
ocm10gfPortSlot.description: The slot within the shelf where the module resides.

ocm10gfPortIndex.name: ocm10gfPortIndex
ocm10gfPortIndex.description: Port for which the below values apply.

ocm10gfPortRxPower.name: ocm10gfPortRxPower
ocm10gfPortRxPower.description: Receive power reported by port SFP.

ocm10gfPortTxReach.name: ocm10gfPortTxReach
ocm10gfPortTxReach.description: Optical reach in meters reported by port SFP.

ocm10gfConnTable.name: ocm10gfConnTable
ocm10gfConnTable.description: This table represents the information for each set of ports on the module. Ports are divided into two sets: mux ports and demux ports.

ocm10gfConnEntry.name: ocm10gfConnEntry
ocm10gfConnEntry.description: Specifies the index for each row in the table below

ocm10gfConnCardShelf.name: ocm10gfConnCardShelf
ocm10gfConnCardShelf.description: The shelf where the module resides.

uobLastBootTime.description: The date and time of the last boot for this module.

uobAvailTime.name: uobAvailTime
uobAvailTime.description: The number of seconds in this time slot (15 minutes) that this module has been up and running. This will generally be the same as 15 minutes in seconds (900).

uobErrFreeSecs.name: uobErrFreeSecs
uobErrFreeSecs.description: The number of seconds in this time slot (15 minutes) that this module has not experienced any alarms.

uobPmTable.name: uobPmTable
uobPmTable.description: This table represents the information for each entry for the software counters.

uobPmShelf.name: uobPmShelf

uobPmSlot.name: uobPmSlot
uobPmSlot.description: The slot within the shelf the card is in. Valid values are: 1 to 17. The system automatically determines the right value for this entry based on the known (available) UOB cards.

uobHistTable.name: uobHistTable
uobHistTable.description: This table represents the information for historical data collected for the UOB module.

uobHistEntry.name: uobHistEntry
